page.title: 03EUROPEAN ELECTRONICS
page.content: Woodham Mortimer Place,a large country house,main part dating from early 18th Century,older part from 16th Century. Now used by European Electronics Systems Limited.Research,Development Laboratories and Manufacturing of timing equipment,optoelectronics and stereoscopics.The Company was formed in 1972 and moved to Woodham Mortimer Place in 1977.There are 65 employees, but the company is expanding and able to take on 1 new employee each week. Their products are used in this country in such places as Railway Stations,Airports,Steel Mills.They export to U.S.A.,Japan,France,Belgium and Australia.It stands in 15 acres, about 7acres as rough grazing for Jacob sheep.A new extension to the old house is finished.The floor area is 4,500 square feet.Traditional materials were used.
